data.message: You look like a clown, you're a retard when you walk out on the street and you take your face off, you're not fooling me, you're the kind of person who does not have what it takes to embarrass everyone with that little guy who is like that, but when he hears my oitao soon running to the mother and the city and the gangsta place is not just for little faces, the races that we do you can not take ten minutes of comedy pulls the bag You do not want to pay me, I I'll turn you into a wrong man and I'll pick you up if you get bored I'll feel my glory, I was a family man, but you made me stay like this, you'll see what's good and feel the cherin '
